examples: He opted for lean ground turkey instead of beef for a healthier burger option.
The company opted for a settlement rather than taking their former employee to court.
As a healthier alternative, they opted for peanut oil instead of butter when making their favorite cookies.
I opted for a lean cut of red meat, such as sirloin, to create a delicious and healthy stir-fry.
Sam opted for a less expensive roofing contractor, but the work waspoorly done, and he had to pay for repairs and replacements later, proving that the poor man pays twice.
words.defineEn: to choose something over something else
words.defineVi: để chọn một cái gì đó trên một cái gì đó khác

examples: He can boast that he married the richest woman in the world.
After boasting that his company could outperform the industry's best, he's been forced to eat humble pie.
The elephant boasts the largest brain of any land mammal, as well as an impressive encephalization quotient.
It boasts, crystal clear communication with its virtual boom arm.
And boasts an immersive soundscape and lasting comfort.
words.defineEn: to talk with great pride about one's achievements, abilities, etc.
words.defineVi: để nói chuyện với niềm tự hào to lớn về thành tích, khả năng của một người, v.v.

examples: We say the Pledge of Allegiance each morning.

words.defineVi: để chính thức hứa sẽ làm một cái gì đó

examples: it seemed to me too much like throwing away the scabbard, and proclaiming that the war with capitalists was begun.

words.defineVi: để công khai thông báo cho mọi người về một cái gì đó

examples: but I decided not to renew the experience!
After a series of setbacks and missteps, the team regrouped and found themselves on the mend, with a renewed sense of purpose and a clear plan for moving forward.
Since joining the yoga class, Mark has been renewing his lease of life, feeling more energized and positive every day.
The writer learned that the best advice is found on the pillow, after taking a break from their work and coming back to it with fresh eyes and renewed creativity.
Despite being unwell the previous day, Lily was up and about, ready to tackle her daily responsibilities with renewed energy and determination.
words.defineEn: to replace something old or damaged with a new one
words.defineVi: để thay thế một cái gì đó cũ hoặc bị hư hỏng với một cái mới

words.defineEn: to continue again after an interruption
words.defineVi: để tiếp tục một lần nữa sau khi bị gián đoạn

words.defineEn: to display something, such as a feeling, attitude, or quality
words.defineVi: để hiển thị một cái gì đó, chẳng hạn như một cảm giác, thái độ, hoặc chất lượng

examples: The United Kingdom is known for its music scene, with iconic bands like The Beatles and Queen originating from the country.

Humans originated as a hybrid between chimps and pigs?
However, Pluto's name actually originates as another name for Hades, the Greek god of the underworld.
words.defineEn: to start to be
words.defineVi: bắt đầu trở thành

examples: The gardener carefully wrapped the stem of the young tree with burlap to protect it from frost during winter.

And the stem contains the tens digits.

words.defineVi: được gây ra bởi một cái gì đó

examples: Acting classes help aspiring actors develop their skills and techniques.

words.defineEn: to desire to have or become something
words.defineVi: để mong muốn có hoặc trở thành một cái gì đó

examples: And their extinction coincides the last appearance of ichthyosaurs in the fossil record.

words.defineEn: to occur simultaneously as something else

examples: The lingonberry sauce perfectly complemented the roasted turkey at Thanksgiving dinner.

words.defineVi: để làm cho ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó tốt hơn hoặc trông đẹp hơn bằng cách giới thiệu một cái gì đó cho họ hoặc nó

examples: These two summit events constitute a framework to assess progress being made under the auspices of President Mbeki.

examples: The book corresponded so exactly with Ulvskog's portrayals that either he knew the book back to front or he had been there himself.

setting the children's mind at ease is the resposibility of parents.
